definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="188" y="131"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_get_fire_ticks"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_extinguish"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Powertoken</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:HeatTransmission</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
